name: Testing the Vessel
tooltip:
Testing the Vessel

Travel to the Hinterlands, and locate the Wildkin. Kill 10, and use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture the fallen Wildkin.

Bring 10 Wildkin Muiseks and the Muisek Vessel to Witch Doctor Uzer'i in Feralas.

Requirements:
- Wildkin Muisek x 10
